quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Education is the key to unlocking the world, a passport to freedom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
author: Brian Herbert

quote: Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The best teachers are those who show you where to look but don't tell you what to see.
author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Education is not just about going to school and getting a degree. It's about widening your knowledge and absorbing the truth about life.
author: Shakuntala Devi

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The aim of education should be to teach us rather how to think, than what to think â€” rather to improve our minds, so as to enable us to think for ourselves, than to load the memory with thoughts of other men.
author: Bill Beattie

quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
author: Socrates

quote: The highest result of education is tolerance.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Education is the art of making man ethical.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
author: Robert M. Hutchins

quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
author: Solomon Ortiz

quote: The aim of education is to enable individuals to continue their education.
author: John Dewey

quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Education is not to reform students or amuse them or to make them expert technicians. It is to unsettle their minds, widen their horizons, inflame their intellects, teach them to think straight, if possible.
author: Robert M. Hutchins

quote: The goal of education is not to increase the amount of knowledge but to create the possibilities for a child to invent and discover, to create men who are capable of doing new things.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: Education is the ability to meet life's situations.
author: Dr. John G. Hibben

quote: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten.
author: B.F. Skinner

quote: Education is the power to think clearly, the power to act well in the world's work, and the power to appreciate life.
author: Brigham Young

quote: Education is not received. It is achieved.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds for the purpose of satisfying it afterwards.
author: Anatole France

quote: Education is not the piling on of learning, information, data, facts, skills, or abilities - that's training or instruction - but is rather making visible what is hidden as a seed.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: The principal goal of education in the schools should be creating men and women who are capable of doing new things, not simply repeating what other generations have done.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: The aim of education should be to teach us rather how to think, than what to think.
author: James Beattie

quote: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future life.
author: Plato

quote: Education is the foundation upon which we build our future.
author: Christine Gregoire

quote: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
author: Will Durant

quote: Education is the mother of leadership.
author: Wendell Willkie

quote: Education is not a product: mark, diploma, job, money in that order; it is a process, a never-ending one.
author: Bel Kaufman

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Education is not only a ladder of opportunity, but it is also an investment in our future.
author: Ed Markey

quote: Education is the transmission of civilization.
author: Will Durant

quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
author: Aristotle

quote: Education is the key that unlocks the golden door to freedom.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Education is the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten everything he learned in school.
author: Albert Einstein
